Chapter.Name: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES, DIPLOMATIC AND CONSULAR RELATIONS, ETC

ExternalData.Titlesect: Convention on the Privileges and Immunities of the United Nations

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 17 September 1946, in accordance with section 32. The Convention first entered into force in regard to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland by the deposit of its instrument of accession.
